original_text: But Amaziah would not listen, for it was of God, in order that he might give them into the hand of their enemies, because they had sought the gods of Edom.
korean_text: 아마샤가 듣지 아니하였으니 이는 하나님께로 말미암은 것이라 그들이 에돔 신들에게 구하였으므로 그 대적의 손에 넘기려 하심이더라

sentences.original_text: in order that he might give them into the hand of their enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 원수의 손에 넘기시려 함이었다

sentences.original_text: because they had sought the gods of Edom
